Module com.group25
Package com.group25

Class Level

java.lang.Object
com.group25.Level
public class Level extends Object
Represents a level in the game, containing information such as time allowed, starting monster health, category, number of stages, and question sets.
Author:
Adam Murdock Gale, Sameer Mehboob Bugti, Saad Meshaal Koker, Jesse Titus, Fahmid Abdullah

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(int timeAllowed, int startingMonsterHealth, String category, int numberOfStages, QuestionSet questionSets)
      Constructs a new level with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      timeAllowed - the time allowed for the level
      startingMonsterHealth - the starting health of the monster in the level
      category - the category of the questions in the level
      numberOfStages - the number of stages in the level
      questionSets - the question sets associated with the level
